title: Hextech Chest inside a Hextech Chest?
body:
Hey guys, 

I just opened two hextech chests in a row... And both of them had another Hextech Chest inside XD.

Since when is that possible ?

That was fun tho !

replies.body: i got this inventory from 1 hextech because of the repeat chest rng: legend. mundo sun goddess karma, kayn and icedrake shyvana. think about the luck on that one.
chest inside a chest inside a chest with keys for both no joke
I just got a chest and a key inside my chest too! I've opened about 50 chests and this is the first time it happened. Either they just added it or its fairly rare.

I created a MEME for this but I couldn't figure out how to post this image itself so here's a link to it

https://memegenerator.net/instance/80789783

We put chests in your chests so you can get more rewards every time you get rewards!

This is indeed working correctly! It's just a little bonus to help get you more loot is all. Heck, I rerolled 3 skin shards and got a chest and key xD
